code: import axios from'../config/axios';export var asyncGetProducts=function asyncGetProducts(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('/products',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(getProducts(result.reverse()));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var getProducts=function getProducts(products){return{type:'GET_PRODUCTS',payload:products};};export var asyncAddProduct=function asyncAddProduct(formData,formReset){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/products',formData,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(addProduct(result));formReset();}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var addProduct=function addProduct(product){return{type:'ADD_PRODUCT',payload:product};};export var asyncDeleteProduct=function asyncDeleteProduct(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/products/".concat(id),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;dispatch(deleteProduct(result._id));}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(id){return{type:'DELETE_PRODUCT',payload:id};};export var asyncEditProduct=function asyncEditProduct(formData,id){return function(dispatch){axios.put("/products/".concat(id),formData,{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(localStorage.getItem('token'))}}).then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(editProduct(result));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var editProduct=function editProduct(product){return{type:'EDIT_PRODUCT',payload:product};};
